item.title: Items 11969+ weap slot
item.dc:creator: @TimeBroken TimeBroken
item.description:
@TimeBroken wrote:

public static boolean playerCape(int itemId) { String[] data = { "cloak", "cape", "attractor", "Attractor", "Ava's", [b]"legends", "Legends", "Legend's"[/b] }; String item = getItemName(itemId); if (item == null) { return false; } boolean item1 = false; for(int i = 0; i < data.length; i++ ) { if(item.endsWith(data[i]) || item.contains(data[i])) { item1 = true; } } return item1; }

Do that sort of thing. Put words that only work with that item.
Make sure not to use generic words such as “of”.

Read full topic

item.title: Items 11969+ weap slot
item.dc:creator: @scenemo scenemo
item.description:
@scenemo wrote:

all my items 11969+ in item.cfg are equipping in weap slot. even if they have the name “cape” they are equipping as a weapon. this is my item.java for capes part

[QUOTE] public static boolean playerCape(int itemId) {
String[] data = {
“cloak”, “cape”, “attractor”, “Attractor”, “Ava’s”
};
String item = getItemName(itemId);
if (item == null) {
return false;
}
boolean item1 = false;
for(int i = 0; i < data.length; i++ ) {
if(item.endsWith(data[i]) || item.contains(data[i])) {
item1 = true;
}
}
return item1;
}[/QUOTE]

Read full topic
